content: single_crochet slip_stitch around to center bottom of the swans body next step chain 65 turn single_crochet in 4th chain from hook and in each chain up to the swans body slip_stitch into next single_crochet chain 3 turn * single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet chain 3 * repeat from * to * to end of bookmark single_crochet in space created by turning chain 3 counts as 1 treble_crochet 3 more treble_crochet working off 2 lps 2 times on each st holding remaining lp on hook till all stitches are done 5 lps on hook 4 lps on 1st cluster yo and draw through all 5 loops 4 treble_crochet cluster st made chain 4 p in top of cluster st chain 3 sl into space at base of cluster * 2sc in next 2 back lps of chain st chain 3 * repeat from * to * to where bookmark joins body slip_stitch into next single_crochet and end off weave in ends and block created and designed by kathyryn a white www crochetnbeads com all patterns may be duplicated for private use but not for resale july 24 2005
